animations.name: Fast Flashing Red
animations.description: A rapid, intense red flash to signify urgency or danger.

animations.name: Cyan Purple Fade
animations.description: A soothing blend of cyan and purple that evokes calm and mystery.

animations.name: Calm Safety Amber
animations.description: A warm amber glow that instills a sense of safety and relaxation.

animations.name: Glitchy Terror
animations.description: Erratic magenta flickers to create a sense of unease and fear.

animations.name: Rainbow Cycle
animations.description: A smooth transition through all rainbow colors, evoking joy and creativity.

animations.name: Passion Pulse
animations.description: A deep red pulse that conveys passion and intensity.

animations.name: Melancholy Wave
animations.description: A slow, fading blue that evokes a sense of melancholy and introspection.

animations.name: Euphoria Burst
animations.description: Bright yellow bursts that simulate feelings of euphoria and excitement.

animations.name: Serene Flow
animations.description: A gentle turquoise flow that creates a tranquil and peaceful atmosphere.

animations.name: Chaos Strobe
animations.description: Rapid alternating colors to represent chaos and unpredictability.

animations.name: Hope Glow
animations.description: A soft yellowish glow that conveys hope and optimism.

animations.name: Anger Flare
animations.description: Sharp red bursts to reflect feelings of anger and frustration.

animations.name: Joyful Spark
animations.description: Bright golden sparks that invoke happiness and excitement.

animations.name: Loneliness Glow
animations.description: A slow, dim blue glow symbolizing solitude and reflection.

animations.name: Nostalgic Glow
animations.description: A soft golden glow that evokes a sense of nostalgia and warmth.

animations.name: Mystical Shimmer
animations.description: A deep purple shimmer that creates an aura of mystery and wonder.
